data.title: Where to watch Brickleberry on Netflix USA
data.meta_description:
Sorry Brickleberry is not available on Netflix USA, but there are other ways to watch it in USA: Brickleberry National Park is facing closure, but not if the park’s dysfunctional park rangers can help it!

“Brickleberry,” an animated half-hour series, follows the crazy bunch of park rangers as they do their worst to keep the park running. Steve (David Herman) has been “Ranger of the Month” every month for years, so he feels threatened when Ethel (Natasha Leggero) is transferred from Yellowstone National Park to help whip the park into shape. Connie (Roger Black) and Denzel (Jerry Minor) are two unique rangers that each bring special skills (or in Denzel’s case, lack of skills) to the job, and Woody (Tom Kenny) is the hapless Head Ranger who puts nothing above his beloved park, except his adopted bear cub, Malloy (Daniel Tosh), who he’s taken in and spoils to death.
data.text:
Synopsis

Brickleberry National Park is facing closure, but not if the park’s dysfunctional park rangers can help it! “Brickleberry,” an animated half-hour series, follows the crazy bunch of park rangers as they do their worst to keep the park running. Steve (David Herman) has been “Ranger of the Month” every month for years, so he feels threatened when Ethel (Natasha Leggero) is transferred from Yellowstone National Park to help whip the park into shape. Connie (Roger Black) and Denzel (Jerry Minor) are two unique rangers that each bring special skills (or in Denzel’s case, lack of skills) to the job, and Woody (Tom Kenny) is the hapless Head Ranger who puts nothing above his beloved park, except his adopted bear cub, Malloy (Daniel Tosh), who he’s taken in and spoils to death.

Cast

Tara Strong

Daniel Tosh

Roger Black

David Herman

Tom Kenny

Jerry Minor

Natasha Leggero

Kaitlin Olson

John DiMaggio

Episodes

Season 1

Season 2

Season 3

Brickleberry: Season 1

Not Available

Welcome to Brickleberry

2012-09-25

Woody hires a new ranger to right the course of a beleaguered Brickleberry.

Not Available

2 Weeks Notice

2012-10-02

Ethel runs a camp for the blind, and Steve contracts a rare disease from a hooker.

Not Available

Saved by the Balls

2012-10-09

Steve and Denzel get mixed up with the mob while trying to crack down on drugs in Brickleberry.

Not Available

Squabbits

2012-10-16

Steve creates the hybrid animal Squabbit in an attempt to reshape Brickleberry's struggling image.

Not Available

Race Off

2012-10-23

Woody sets the park on fire in an effort to impress a visiting dignitary.

Not Available

Gay Bomb

2012-10-30

Connie flees an anti-gay church group, only to discover a secret military hideout.

Not Available

Hello Dottie

2012-11-13

Woody outsources his ranger jobs to Indian bots after the team demands better working conditions.

Not Available

Steve's Bald

2012-11-20

Steve's secret hair-loss shame prompts him to imbibe a mystery elixir that turns him into Bigfoot.

Not Available

Daddy Issues

2012-11-27

Steve's quest to uncover the mystery behind goat attacks yields a shocking discovery about his dad.

Not Available

The Dam Show

2012-12-04

Woody's birthday party triggers a flood, forcing survivors to seek mountaintop refuge.

Brickleberry: Season 2

Not Available

Miracle Lake

2013-09-03

Woody discovers the healing properties of Brickleberry Lake, and Ethel and Denzel find Crog.

Not Available

The Comeback

2013-09-10

The rangers learn of Woody's porn past, and Denzel is briefed on the Brickleberry ghost.

Not Available

Woody's Girl

2013-09-17

A stroke causes Woody to relinquish his post as head ranger, and Denzel claims an inheritance.

Not Available

Trailer Park

2013-09-24

A shocking discovery leads Bobby and BoDean to turn Brickleberry into a trailer park.

Not Available

Crippleberry

2013-10-01

Connie becomes obsessed with a carnival's freak show, and Malloy gets litigious following Steve's injury.

Not Available

Ranger Games

2013-10-08

The Brickleberry rangers compete in the Ranger Games, and Malloy adopts a new pet.

Not Available

My Way or the Highway

2013-10-15

Governor Melcher turns Brickleberry into a highway, and Connie infiltrates a militia.

Not Available

Little Boy Malloy

2013-10-22

Sibling rivalry causes Ethel to pretend Malloy is her son, and Malloy battles a bully.

Not Available

The Animals Strike Back

2013-10-29

The animals of Brickleberry stage a coup, and Steve covers up the truth about Malloy's parents' deaths.

Not Available

Scared Straight

2013-11-05

Denzel enlists his Detroit "Cool Friends Gang" to scare straight a misbehaving Malloy.

Not Available

Trip to Mars

2013-11-12

NASA uses Mt. Brickleberry as the set for a fake Mars landing, and Steve takes a ton of peyote.

Not Available

My Favorite Bear

2013-11-19

When Flamey the Bear visits Brickleberry, Steve struggles to keep up with his extreme lifestyle.

Not Available

A-Park-A-Lypse

2013-11-26

Denzel becomes convinced that Connie's new baby is the antichrist.

Brickleberry: Season 3

Not Available

Obamascare

2014-09-16

President Obama visits Brickleberry just as Woody undergoes a drastic surgical procedure, and Bobby creates his own alternative to Obamacare.

Not Available

In Da Club

2014-09-23

When Denzel gets accepted into an elite country club, a slighted Steve befriends a group of lesbians.

Not Available

Miss National Park

2014-09-30

Ethel and Connie compete fiercely at the Miss National Park beauty pageant, and Denzel and Steve decide to have a threesome when they learn they are dating the same woman.

Not Available

That Brother's My Father

2014-10-07

Denzel marries Woody's mother; Connie has an unhealthy obsession with "Wheel of Fortune" host Pat Sajak.

Not Available

Write 'Em Cowboy

2014-10-14

Denzel helps Steve launch a career as a gay country music star; a granted wish turns Malloy into a full-size bear.

Not Available

Old Wounds

2014-10-21

The Secretary of the Interior visits Brickleberry and demotes Woody; Denzel becomes a new man after he gives up smoking weed.

Not Available

Baby Daddy

2014-10-28

While she is drunk, Ethel sleeps with Steve and gets pregnant; the rangers get committed to a mental hospital.

Not Available

Steve the Fearless Pilot

2014-11-04

When hypnosis on Steve goes horribly wrong, he starts acting like a swashbuckling pirate; Connie and Denzel get stranded on a lesbian island paradise.

Not Available

High Stakes

2014-11-11

A corrupt mayor becomes friends with Woody and Woody loses the park to him in a poker bet; Malloy finds out he must breed with an unattractive bear to continue his species.

Not Available

Amber Alert

2014-11-18

Ethel feels threatened by an attractive new female ranger; Denzel is transferred to a secluded fire lookout tower.

Not Available

Cops and Bottoms

2015-03-31

Steve becomes a cop and gets a dangerous biker gang upset; Woody's hemorrhoid becomes a religious icon.

Not Available

Campin' Ain't Easy

2015-04-07

Woody turns the park into a Native American-themed summer camp and becomes attracted to one of the female campers.

Not Available

Global Warning

2015-04-14

Woody tries to create the biggest carbon footprint ever; Ethel counteracts Woody's behavior by becoming Amish.

Where to watch "Brickleberry" online

Here are all the ways you can stream "Brickleberry" in USA. Some of these are to rent or buy the title. Others require a free or paid subscription to a streaming service.
